SELECT f.file_no , f.prjt_no , f.buss_no , f.file_nm , f.file_path , f.file_type , f.file_desct , f.file_dt , mem.memb_nm , f.file_size FROM project_file f, project p, business b, member mem WHERE f.buss_no = b.buss_no AND b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no AND f.memb_id = mem.memb_id AND f.prjt_no = #{prjtNo}
AND f.file_nm LIKE '%' || #{pKeyword} || '%'
AND mem.memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{pKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY file_no DESC

SELECT f.file_no , f.prjt_no , f.buss_no , f.file_nm , f.file_path , f.file_type , f.file_desct , f.file_dt , mem.memb_nm , f.file_size , b.buss_nm , p.prjt_nm
FROM project_file f, project p, business b, member mem WHERE f.buss_no = b.buss_no AND b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no AND f.memb_id = mem.memb_id AND f.buss_no = #{bussNo}
AND f.file_nm LIKE '%' || #{keywordFile} || '%'
AND mem.memb_nm LIKE '%' || #{keywordFile} || '%'
ORDER BY f.file_no DESC

SELECT f.file_no , f.prjt_no , f.buss_no , f.file_nm , f.file_path , f.file_type , f.file_desct , f.file_dt , mem.memb_nm , f.file_size
FROM project_file f, project p, business b, member mem WHERE f.buss_no = b.buss_no AND b.prjt_no = p.prjt_no AND f.memb_id = mem.memb_id AND f.file_no = #{fileNo}
